document.full_text: lt. abubakar 'toumba' diakite told radio france international that he shot capt. moussa 'dadis' camara on dec. 3 because the junta leader betrayed the democracy of the west african nation.
document.title: former presidential guard chief in guinea says he shot junta leader
lines_and_colors: lt. abubakar 'toumba' diakite told radio france international that he shot capt. moussa 'dadis' camara on dec. 3 because the junta leader betrayed the democracy of the west african nation.
